hero.question: US strikes Iran by March 7, 2026?
hero.prob_take: Traders just got less convinced an Iran strike happens in the next 10 months, knocking the odds down to 28.5% in the last day. Watch whether new tensions in the Middle East or US political developments flip this back up, because markets this volatile tend to be pricing in real uncertainty rather than noise.

daily_take.headline: Iran Strike Odds Crater as Market Smells De-Escalation
daily_take.deck: Bettors yanked 11 points off the US-Iran conflict probability in 24 hours, dropping it to 28.5%. The move suggests traders are reading recent diplomatic signals and Trump's unpredictable-but-cautious posture differently than they were yesterday. When prediction markets shift this fast on geopolitics, something spooked the consensus.

sidebar.headline: Bitcoin stays pinned below $55K with 68.5% confidence. Crypto traders are betting on a continuation of the grind, not a recovery.
